titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the 100 percent exclusion for gain on certain small business stock.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S289-290)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/26/2011--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2012 the 100% exclusion from gross income of gain from the sale of certain small business stock.
